name: Generic RPG Idle - Rituals & Magic
description:
An idle RPG where your loot matters. Optimize your equipment, defeat a variety of foes, perform dark rituals for the lunar god and enjoy a medieval tale of revenge in a twisted version of Brazil. Elite enemies challenge how optimized your build is, while random-free combat ensures attacks never miss


A bunch of new features from the last time I posted on Itch IO! Too many to list.

Full version on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1858120/Generic_RPG_Idle/

Game is still underdevelopment and bugs are fixed fast!
